languages.text: {n}Идира изумленно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Откуда... хотя что это я. Вы же тогда, когда меня звали..." {n}Псайкер опускает взгляд, ее голос сбивается.{/n} "Беспокоится, говорите? Поговорить, да, так давно не говорили... Отличная идея, {name}. Так и сделаю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира изумленно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Откуда... хотя что это я. Вы же тогда, когда меня звали..." {n}Псайкер опускает взгляд, ее голос сбивается.{/n} "Беспокоится, говорите? Поговорить, да, так давно не говорили... Отличная идея, {name}. Так и сделаю".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira looks at you in surprise.{/n} "How did you— wait, what am I saying? You said her name, when you were trying to..." {n}She looks down and says in a thick voice,{/n} "You said she's worried? You think I should talk to her, yeah? We haven't talked in a long time... Good idea, {name}. I'll do that."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉惊讶地看着你。{/n}“你是怎么知——等等，我在说什么傻话呢？你提到了她的名字，你是想……”{n}她低下头，用沙哑的声音开了口。{/n}“你说她很担心我？你觉得我应该和她谈谈，是吗？我们已经很久都没谈过了……好主意，{name}，我会去找她谈谈的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you in surprise.{/n} "How did you— wait, what am I saying? You said her name, when you were trying to..." {n}She looks down and says in a thick voice,{/n} "You said she's worried? You think I should talk to her, yeah? We haven't talked in a long time... Good idea, {name}. I'll do that."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉惊讶地看着你。{/n}“你是怎么知——等等，我在说什么傻话呢？你提到了她的名字，你是想……”{n}她低下头，用沙哑的声音开了口。{/n}“你说她很担心我？你觉得我应该和她谈谈，是吗？我们已经很久都没谈过了……好主意，{name}，我会去找她谈谈的。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you in surprise.{/n} "How did you— wait, what am I saying? You said her name, when you were trying to..." {n}She looks down and says in a thick voice,{/n} "You said she's worried? You think I should talk to her, yeah? We haven't talked in a long time... Good idea, . I'll do that."

languages.text: {n}Idira te mira, sorprendida.{/n} «¿Cómo...? Espera, ¿qué digo? Dijo su nombre cuando estaba intentando...». {n}Baja la mirada y continúa con la voz cargada:{/n} «¿Ha dicho que está preocupada? Debería hablar con ella, ¿verdad? Hace mucho que no hablamos... Es buena idea, {name}. Eso haré».

You said her name, when you were trying to..." {n}She looks down and says in a thick voice,{/n} "You said she's worried? You think I should talk to her, yeah? We haven't talked in a long time... Good idea, {name}. I'll do that."

Dijo su nombre cuando estaba intentando...». {n}Baja la mirada y continúa con la voz cargada:{/n} «¿Ha dicho que está preocupada? Debería hablar con ella, ¿verdad? Hace mucho que no hablamos... Es buena idea, {name}. Eso haré».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは驚いてあなたを見る。{/n}「どうやって…待って、あたいは何を言っているの？あなたは彼女の名前を言った。あなたが…」{n}彼女は下を向いて、太い声で話す。{/n}「彼女が心配していたというの？陛下は、あたいが彼女と話すべきだと思う？長いこと話してなかったから…いい考えね、{name}様。そうしましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you in surprise.{/n} "How did you— wait, what am I saying? You said her name, when you were trying to..." {n}She looks down and says in a thick voice,{/n} "You said she's worried? You think I should talk to her, yeah? We haven't talked in a long time... Good idea, {name}. I'll do that."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは驚いてあなたを見る。{/n}「どうやって…待って、あたいは何を言っているの？あなたは彼女の名前を言った。あなたが…」{n}彼女は下を向いて、太い声で話す。{/n}「彼女が心配していたというの？陛下は、あたいが彼女と話すべきだと思う？長いこと話してなかったから…いい考えね、{name}様。そうしましょう」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira blickt dich überrascht an.{/n} "Woher — Augenblick, was rede ich da? Ihr habt ihren Namen gesagt, als Ihr versucht habt ..." {n}Sie blickt hinab und sagt mit belegter Stimme:{/n} "Sie macht sich Sorgen, sagt Ihr? Ihr denkt also, ich sollte mit ihr sprechen? Wir haben schon lange nicht mehr miteinander geredet ... Ein guter Einfall, {name}. Das werde ich tun."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you in surprise.{/n} "How did you— wait, what am I saying? You said her name, when you were trying to..." {n}She looks down and says in a thick voice,{/n} "You said she's worried? You think I should talk to her, yeah? We haven't talked in a long time... Good idea, {name}. I'll do that."

Ihr habt ihren Namen gesagt, als Ihr versucht habt ..." {n}Sie blickt hinab und sagt mit belegter Stimme:{/n} "Sie macht sich Sorgen, sagt Ihr? Ihr denkt also, ich sollte mit ihr sprechen? Wir haben schon lange nicht mehr miteinander geredet ... Ein guter Einfall, {name}. Das werde ich tun."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira semble stupéfaite.{/n} « Comment avez-vous... Attendez, qu'est-ce que je raconte ? Vous avez prononcé son nom quand vous essayiez de... » {n}Elle baisse les yeux et poursuit d'une voix plus maîtrisée :{/n} « Elle s'inquiète, hein ? Vous croyez que je devrais lui parler ? Ça fait longtemps qu'on n'en a pas eu l'occasion... Bonne idée, {name}. Je vais faire ça. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you in surprise.{/n} "How did you— wait, what am I saying? You said her name, when you were trying to..." {n}She looks down and says in a thick voice,{/n} "You said she's worried? You think I should talk to her, yeah? We haven't talked in a long time... Good idea, {name}. I'll do that."

Ça fait longtemps qu'on n'en a pas eu l'occasion... Bonne idée, {name}. Je vais faire ça. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, şaşkın bir şekilde sana bakıyor.{/n} "Nasıl?.. Bir saniye, neler söylüyorum ben? Onun adını söylemiştin, hani şeyle uğraşırken..." {n}Gözlerini yere dikerek ciddi bir tonla konuşuyor.{/n} "Endişeleniyor mu dedin? Sence onunla konuşmalı mıyım? Konuşmayalı bayağı oldu ama... İyi fikir {name}. Gidip konuşayım."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you in surprise.{/n} "How did you— wait, what am I saying? You said her name, when you were trying to..." {n}She looks down and says in a thick voice,{/n} "You said she's worried? You think I should talk to her, yeah? We haven't talked in a long time... Good idea, {name}. I'll do that."

İyi fikir {name}. Gidip konuşayım."
